channel.title: Comments on: Net Neutrality in Broadcasting

item.title: By: Antony
item.dc:creator: Antony
item.description: Always wonder on how many broadcast operators does actually supports at least open TV channel where anybody can come and show anything, sort of community TV channel, I am heard about this idea being supported by some cable TV operators but does 'open content' attracts operator's attention in any way?
item.content:encoded: Always wonder on how many broadcast operators does actually supports at least open TV channel where anybody can come and show anything, sort of community TV channel, I am heard about this idea being supported by some cable TV operators but does ‘open content’ attracts operator’s attention in any way?
